titleStmt.title: An act for enabling judges to hold an assize at Durham. Wednesday July 13. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Tho. St Nicholas Clerk of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field, printer to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Initial letter; lext in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church
